title: What is the meaning of the tamil song Nee partha paarvai from Hey Ram? - Quora

response.answer_text: Plot: They meet after a long time… Female : Nee partha parvaikkoru nandri(thank you for the look that you had for me)…she was longing for it Namai sertha iravukkoru nandri(i thank this night that united us) Ayaraatha ilamai sollum nandri nandri(thank you for making this moment young forever) Akalaatha ninaivu sollum nandri nandri(thank you for making this memory un erasable) Female : Naan endra sol ini vendamm(henceforth no need of the word "I") Nee enbathae ini naanthaan(from now you means me only) Inimelum varam ketka thevaillai(from now there is no need to make a wish) Ithupol verengum sorgamillai(there is no heaven like this anywhere else) Uyirae vaa…(come my soul) Male : Naadagam mudintha pinnalum Nadippinnum thodarvathu enaa(why is the acting being continued though the drama has got over) Oranga vedam ini podhum pennae(oh girl no need to sleep anymore) Uyir pogum mattum unn ninaivae kannae(your thoughts will remain till my soul leaves) Uyirae vaaa…(come my soul)
